articles.author: Lloyd Burnard
articles.title: Zimbabwean cricket great Heath Streak dead at 49
articles.description: Zimbabwean cricket great Heath Streak died at 49, his wife confirmed on Sunday.
articles.content:
Former Zimbabwe cricket captain and one of the country's greatest ever players, Heath Streak, died at the age of 49 on Sunday. 
He had been diagnosed with liver and colon cancer. 
Streak's wife, Na… [+587 chars]

articles.title: Famous cricketer dead, wife confirms
articles.description: Just over a week after false reports of his passing, Zimbabwean cricketing great Heath Streak has now died after a battle with cancer.
articles.content:
Just over a week after false reports of his passing, Zimbabwean cricketing great Heath Streak has now died after a battle with cancer.
Streak’s wife Nadine posted the news on Facebook that the 49-ye… [+2361 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
